title: Camera fogs out in strong wind
content:
After few months from the purchase and after 3 strong weathers (no rain), I can surely say that the camera of my pixel 4A become foggy when I use it in strong wind (not even cold).
Is this an issue of my phone or is the pixel 4a that is what it is?
My old Nexus 4 don't do that.
Some video examples:
Clean:
https://i.imgur.com/Cm9fbfj.mp4
With condensation: 
https://i.imgur.com/ROREj6C.mp4
